subject: Package stopped by customs
description_text:
Dear

My order #SSN4914 was stopped by local border control and they are asking me to provide my invoice and proof of payment.
I notice the invoice they provided from you is for 59 USD.

This will most likely cause problems.

I will wait a day for your response before sending them anything.

Kind regards
Maximillien

conversations.body_text: Hi Maximillien Buron,    Please present your invoice. After paying the customs duties, send the invoice to us and we will reimburse you.

Dear

Please see attached invoice.


Item value + transport =240.46 USD or 207.61 euros

VAT 20% = 42 euros

Import file fees UPS = 22.14 euros

Customs presentation fees = 33.96 euros


Kind regards

Maximillien

________________________________
Hi Maximillien Buron,    Okay, we've reimbursed you 20 euros. Please check your account.
